radiographic_examinations.findings: Before clozapine treatment, WBC count was 4.2 x 10^9/L; during treatment until February 2007 it was above 4.0 x 10^9/L. February 2007: 3.7 x 10^9/L (neutrophil count 1.9 x 10^9/L). February 2009: WBC count suddenly decreased to 2.5 x 10^9/L (neutrophil count 1.3 x 10^9/L). April 2009: 1.9 x 10^9/L (neutrophil count 1.0 x 10^9/L).
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: WBC count decreased over time, reaching the lowest point of 1.9 x 10^9/L before recovering after the discontinuation of clozapine, increasing to 3.5 x 10^9/L one week later and to 5.9 x 10^9/L in May 2011.
